---
format:
  pdf :
    documentclass: report
    fontsize: 12pt
    classoption: notitlepage, twoside
    indent: true
    geometry:
      - width=8.5in
      - height=11in
      - left=1in
      - right=1in
      - top=1in
      - bottom=1.25in
      - showframe=FALSE
    monofont: DejaVu Sans Mono
    df-print: kable
    fig-cap-location: top
    highlight-style: github
    include-in-header:
      - metafiles/header.tex
execute:
  echo: FALSE
  warning: FALSE
knitr:
  opts_chunk: 
    dev: "ragg_png"
editor: visual
bibliography: libraries.bib
csl: metafiles/chicago-fullnote-bibliography-short-title-subsequent.csl
nocite: |
  @*
---
